Adult white morph.description: The Snow Goose is larger with a bigger bill than Ross's Goose. It has a black line or grinning patch on the bill that Ross's Goose lacks.

Adult blue morph.description: The Snow Goose is larger with a bigger bill than Ross's Goose. The Blue morph Snow Goose also has a black line or grinning patch on the bill that Ross's Goose lacks.
